      • makeRequest

        public static boolean makeRequest(String url,
                                  String Data,
                                  HttpRequestType method,
                                  HttpRequestUtil.HttpRequestCallback httpRequestCallback)
        make an http based request to interact with webservice. All POST request are expected to be of type JSON, we will serialize the JSON object from a string. Please only provide integers, strings, or string arrays. String arrays should be ; seperated.
        Parameters:
        url - - base url of the destination web service
        Data - - can be query string or json string for sending data
        method - - see HttpRequestType , used for specifying the type of http request
        httpRequestCallback - - call back function that implements json/gson wrapper, such as a request object.
